p.d: Ana is found dead, her heart torn out, just before she was to leave the psychiatric hospital where she had been sectioned. A first investigation for Angele Maury, one she'll have to conduct alone. But how to question the mentally ill? Can they be believed? Was the murderer a patient? Directed by: Vincent Lannoo (France, 2018) Screenplay: Jeanne Le Guillou, Bruno Dega Cast: Noémie Schmidt (Angele Maury), Béatrice Dalle (Élisabeth Favard), Hippolyte Girardot (Raphaël Santi), Judith El Zein (Alexandra Santi), Samuel Theis (Simon), Grégoire Leprince-Ringuet (Maxime), Mylene Demongeot (Rose), Achille Ridolfi (Louis), Émilie Dequenne (Camille), Scali Delpeyrat (Guillaume), Florence Thomassin (Valérie), Antoine Gouy (Bastien), Jérémy Gillet (Arnaud), Yaël Abecassis (Iris Galmont) Genre: detective Awards: Pyrénées d'Or prize for the best mini-series, audience prize for the best mini-series, 2019 Luchon Festival for Television Creation. Parental guidance: TV-PG
